metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10859 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
git-annex is vulnerable to an Information Exposure when decrypting files. Amalicious server for a special remote could trick git-annex into decryptinga file that was encrypted to the user's gpg key. This attack could be usedto expose encrypted data that was never stored in git-annex

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10859` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

git-annex - 7.20190129-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: git-annex package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.20190129-3').
